text: The .277 Fury or 6.8Ã—51mm Common Cartridge is a cartridge used in rifles (a kind of gun). Weapons that can use the cartridge, include *SIG MCX Spear *XM7 rifle, used by the U.S. military *XM250 automatic rifle, used by U.S. military 6.8 common cartridge is a name used by the U.S. Army. ==References== Category:Ammunition
title: .277 Fury
